text: Yes I was running late and got hung up in traffic .So I called the lady at fast fixin and ask her to please stay open for ten extra minutes that I was on my way .She told. me that they closed at 5:30 and she had other things to do after work and I said please to have drove a long way to get there and ten minutes is all I'm asking .I got there at 20 till 6 only to find them closed.If you can't help yourcustomers out every once in awhile then you have no longer got my businesses. Again Ten minutes

I'm just saying they could have at least sat in the car 5 min until we arrived it's sad that no one has compassion these days I Will never go back or recommend.

name: Ludovico Handfield
text: My kitchen is well-stocked because of Sanford. I set up a wedding registry with them before I got married, and I'm so glad I did. My kitchen is filled with great, restaurant-worthy untensils and tools because of them. I also worked at several restaurants who utilized the services at Sanford, and the employees are wonderful to work with.  I highly recommend shopping at Sanford Restaurant Equipment in Northport. They have outstanding customer service, the people that work there are so friendly and will help you find exactly what you are looking for. They have a great selection of kitchen small wares and equipment, if you love to cook this is the place to shop!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much. We are so happy to help you !!!

text: Had a positive experience today. Staff was friendly and helpful. Prices are super low, bought a lot and spent a little. I had went to another restaurant supply store today on Greensboro Ave, I saw they had a no weapons sign posted at door so I turned around and took my business to Sanford's in Northport. They must be gun friendly, no one said anything  about me open carrying while I was shopping. Will definitely shop here again.

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming in and shopping with us !!!!

name: Drew Lumsden
text: Very helpful, with great pricing and service!

name: Seth Pike
text: Great Pricing

name: Max McGill
text: great prices on whole beef NY strips,  rib eyes, inside round roasts,  pork ribs & frozen veggies.  beef in bulk is $3 to $4 dollars less than grocery stores & quality is fantastic.  never had a poor steak, roast or ribs. beef shoulders are great also, something that is impossible to find locally unless you pay 50% more.  institutional cans of items are also below normal retail.   I'm impressed.

name: Hadley Adams
text: I love Monarch. I can always easily find the things I'd struggled to find elsewhere at Monarch, for reasonable prices. Idk what I'd do if they stopped carrying gallon jugs, sample cups, or any of the things I need on a daily basis for my business. Mrs. Lynn is a jewel. I love her!

name: Dejuan Luckett
text: I love this place and the stag very friendly and helpful kudos U.SFoods

name: Gayle Walker
text: Went by and the doors were locked before the hours started on the door... employees looked at me and kept with transactions... will never be back and it was my first time going...

name: Lauren Burrowes
text: I love their prices and their food quality

name: Renda
text: Good place to buy in bulk.

name: Donald Bowler
text: Always good service here!

name: Sam Spencer
text: Quality convenience Chef approved

name: Robin Barnett
text: They are awesome

name: Jim Chen
text: I love this shop. I took photos two years ago. It's business hours. Now I'm very sad. I don't know why. Why did it close down? I'm really sad. ——I'm Jim   From Mr.Chen‘s

name: Matthew Bracknell
text: Worked there several years ago and was a great place to work R.I.P. Sandy

name: Beverly Tease
text: Just called to ask a question and the person who answered the phone was rude. I asked about selling an item and was told 'that's not easily resellable. talk to you later'...click. hung up on me. thanks for your kindness.

name: Carlissa Murphy
text: I shop here for everything from nozzles for my liquor bottles, to baskets to serve food, silverware, floor mats, food warmers. I always get the best service, over the phone and in person!

name: Buddy Goodwin
text: Only restaurant equipment company in the tricounty area with product in inventory and offering full in-house repair services.

name: Stephen Sides
text: Great staff, very helpful, knowledgeable, and down to earth. Filled my needs quickly and efficiently.

name: sandy morrison
text: Kim is the person you want to deal with. She is open and honest, super helpful.

name: Tony Studdard
text: Friendly Service.

name: Amanda Pearce
text: I recently bought scrubs for my new job. I have been a customer with them for 6 years. I love them! They will bend over backwards to help you get what you need. The are extremely kind and always have a smile on their face! They even have accessories that are unique! I will Continue to recommend them to everyone I know. If you live In or near Fairhope or Foley make your way out!

resp.text: This made my day! Thank you!

name: Susan Fitzpatrick
text: The ladies working in the store greeted me as soon as I walked in and asked if I needed any help.  Very friendly and willing to help. Good variety of scrubs, socks, etc. I also received a nice discount. I will definitely return to this shop for future purchases.

resp.text: Thank you, Susan, for the awesome review. We appreciate the kind words! ❤️

name: Rhonda Thomas
text: Clerk was knowledgeable about sizes and fit of all the different uniforms.  Very friendly and willing to help. Just wish they had my sizes in stock but they had no problem ordering and should be here soon.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Rhonda! We appreciate it!

name: Jessica Kelley
text: I Love uniforms Plus!!!! Susan in the Foley store and Heather in the Fairhope location are both Amazing and super helpful! They are both Always friendly, and make the shopping experience a Great was one!!

resp.text: Thank you, Jessica! We appreciate the awesome review! ❤️

name: Sara Whalley
text: Super helpful people.! I haven't had to wear scrubs for a few years and went into the store clueless of size and fit. They picked out a few options for me. Also I'm six foot tall and its hard to find longs that fit a large person! They nailed it and I was out of there in 20 mins!

resp.text: Thank you for the sweet review, Sara! So glad that we could help you find the perfect fit!

name: lisa clark
text:
The clerk waa very helpful
I got my pants i wanted in correct sz was iut the door quick because of the clerk being so helpful and friendly

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! I’m so glad you had a great experience!

name: Kelly DeShay
text: I had a great experience with this scrub shop.  Ordering my scrubs in the store was extremely easy and the person who took care of me was very friendly and knowledgeable.  My scrubs came in rather quickly and they had them embroidered in no time.  Amazing customer service, very friendly and they kept me up to date on my order.  I will most definitely continue to use Uniforms Plus in the future.

resp.text: Thank you, Kelly! We appreciate you taking the time to give us that amazing review! You have been awesome to work with as well!

name: Anne Miller
text: Awesome place! Friendly and helpful staff in Foley and Fairhope!! Will definitely be back!

resp.text: Thank you, Anne! We appreciate the sweet review!

name: Ti “T” Ch
text: This is my favorite uniform store! They have so many awesome products and brands to choose from, have awesome sales, good pricing, and the staff is always so sweet and kind.  Great place!

resp.text: Thanks so much for taking the time to give us such a sweet review! We appreciate it!

name: Sarah Carll - Fox
text: Susan was awesome! She helped me find the perfect scrubs and was so kind and helpful with the prices. I will be a returning customer for sure! She even said they have a store in Fairhope! Awesome!

resp.text: Thank you, Sarah, for the awesome review! We appreciate it!

name: Kimberly
text: I had the greatest experience. Casual, down to earth and very very helpful with no judgment at all. Super great prices and discounts. I will definitely be going back.

resp.text: Thank you, Kimberly. I’m so glad you had a great experience!

name: Sonya Blair
text: They were great.  Went in for a jacket, ended up with it, set of scrubs, shoes, lanyard, socks, hemostats, coffee mug and more.  No pressure, they were just helpful.  Would definitely go back, and will.  Recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Sonya! We appreciate it!

name: Maddie Hall
text: Great experience! I practically didn’t have to do anything! Heather brought me multiple different items to try on and took care of everything I needed. I left with 5 pair of scrubs and two pair of compression socks! I WILL be back!

resp.text: Thank you, Maddie, for taking the time to write a review. We appreciate it! So glad you had a great experience!

name: Jan Adams
text: The girls have been extremely helpful. They researched to find  exactly what I was looking for and ordered it. They are knowledgeable about current recommendations mandated by OSHA.

resp.text: Thank you, Jan. I’m glad that labcoat worked out for you!

name: Katheryn Raymond
text: Wow! Customer Service. I was getting uniforms for my daughter and didn't have a clue what to get her. The staff found some excellent choices for us! After we left they went the extra steps and fixed her logo---we didn't have the right one. They got it worked out and we didn't even know we had an issue! I'd recommend Uniforms Plus to anyone wanting a quality product and super customer service!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words! We appreciate it! I’m glad we could help!

name: Haley Levengood
text: The staff was very knowledgeable and took the time to help me find exactly what I needed!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the awesome review! We appreciate it!

name: Barbara Martin
text: Very friendly and always goes the extra mile to help you get what your looking for!

name: Rosemary Lee
text: Awesome prices! Heather was so helpful n kind. I told everyone...they're definitely gonna check yall out. I will be shopping there again!

resp.text: Thank you, Rosemary, for taking the time to leave a review! We appreciate it!

name: Jennifer Parsons
text: I had a hard time finding a style of scrubs I was comfortable in post baby. They were very friendly and super helpful and helped me find something that worked for me.

resp.text: Thank you, Jennifer! I’m happy to hear you found something comfortable!

name: Melanie bridges
text: I went in ge to look around and see what they had as in uniforms(of course) and the prices(primarily) . I've been suffering abs lost 25 pounds since February and didn't realize(until today😉) that I was in a medium scrub pant (yay!!) The lady that was there, I like her personality and she made other uniform suggestions that would look great on me.. as in the feel, the dexterity, the price and color and I ordered my first set and felt great about it I can't wait to wear it to my job.

resp.text: Thank you, Melanie! I’m so glad that we were able to help you find your size and something comfortable. Congrats on wearing a medium pant! That’s awesome!

name: Jodi Sessions
text: Shop local.  Best experience ever.  All the staff are super friendly and they have the cutest scrubs.

resp.text: Thank you, Jodi! I enjoyed seeing you on Saturday. I’m glad you ♥️ the Fairhope location!

name: ricky adkins
text: Awesome place. She opened on Sunday for us after we drove 3 hours from Panama City. Very nice owner. We will be back.

resp.text: Thanks so much! Please let me know if you need anything.

name: Cherokee Chamblin
text: A very enjoyable experience!!! The staff was extremely helpful and the price was right!! My new home for buying scrubs!!😀

resp.text: Thank you, Cherokee! It was so nice meeting you and I love your name :)

name: Laura Clark
text: There are so nice and helpful!!!! Helped me with an idea for my nieces and nephews Christmas!!!! Thank you so much!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Laura! I hope your nieces and nephews love their scrubs! Have a Merry Christmas! 🎄

name: Bobbie Castlen
text: Wonderful service and super helpful but not pushy! I will purchase all my uniforms from here in the future.

resp.text: Thank you, Bobbie! I’m glad you had a good experience.

name: Emily Lackey
text: Great selection and they are extremely helpful with finding scrubs that you're looking for.

resp.text: Thank you, Emily!

Good selection of chef clothing, very helpful.
Great job

resp.text: Thank you, James, for taking the time to write a review! We appreciate it!

text: Uniforms plus was awesome their prices were great in the staff knew exactly what I was looking for and what sizes I needed and had me In-N-Out less than 30 minutes!

text: Every single pair of chef pants I have purchased from Scrubs has came apart at the stitching and I'm not exaggerating at least 7 pairs and they charge me $30 a pair I would not recommend going here.

Im glad that they had what I needed today

name: Darlene Carpenter
text: Very nice people! Was asked if I needed any help,or was ready for check out? They have a good variety and fair prices for what I was buying.

name: Tatiana Kontoulakos
text: Always friendly service. They will help you with anything you need to get.

name: A Todd Baker
text: Extremely helpful staff and the go to for professional food service tools.

name: Herb Wright
text: Fair prices

name: Daniel Pearson
text: Great customer service

name: MrsK Harvey
text:
We have visited this store twice in about 5 years. Both times we have been ignored for at least 15 minutes (timed it today) and the prices they quote seem to be pulled out of a hat. Different people, different prices.

Do yourself a favor and shop around before wasting your time going to Dykes.

name: Paul Spell
text: Quick, courteous helpful service

name: Mike Harrold
text: Great customer service

name: Mike Presson
text: Great place to load. Very nice people and friendly. Thanks guys for the quick service 👍

name: C Porter
text: I've been  Enjoying There coffee's for years.

name: Walter Hernandez
text: It's a good place to work for. Friendly environment and they  care for everyone.

name: Easton Lynn
text: They offer a great variety of fresh food. I love dining here. The employees are always super friendly, prices are affordable and the place is always clean.

name: Douglas Adams
text: This spot is great! Good prices, large dishes and the staff members are regularly super nice.

name: Nilipour Oriental Rugs
text: My family and I are thankful to Mr. and Mrs. Smith of Royal Cup Coffee Co.!  We have enjoyed our mornings so much more now that have been introduced to some of the finest coffees!  What a treat to wake up to such a wonderfully bold aroma and it goes down so smooth!  Thank you for being such a landmark to Birmingham, AL!

name: CJ Britton
text: Royal Cup is easily one of the best places I've had the pleasure to work at. While we serve (the best) coffee and tea nationwide I will proudly say that the company does everything it can to serve its people first. While it is a tired HR trope to say this, at Royal Cup is it so true. Here you're not an employee, you're family.

name: Dan Micoley
text: Nice people but takes more time to figure put where your load gos than to unload,  And that's not very fast either.

name: Marcus Kirby
text: I am a business partner of Royal Cup, and have found them to be very friendly and professional. They are some of my favorite folks to work with.

name: Brian Chapman
text:
Great experience  ! Nice folks,  and  had an appointment for the next morning,  and  they unloaded me early.
About an hour opening to closing doors.

name: Jon Biancardi
text: Royal Cup offers exceptionally smooth coffees and flavorful teas as well as instills a customer-centric approach through sales, service, and customized beverage programs.

name: paquiao manuel
text: just trying to make a delivery.. nobody knows who is receiving the load...they have several warehouses..2 hours spend driving back and forth

name: Abdelhamed Hasan
text:
Amazing people with amazing attitudes
I love this place,,, in and out in 1 hour

name: Jason Letcher
text: The amazing Aroma of fresh-brewed coffee.

name: Dakota Nichols
text: Great coffee (and tea), great customer service, and great for the city of Birmingham!

name: Jason Mydland
text: Awesome people! Great Coffee.

name: Birdivender Singh Birring
text: Slow very very slow unloading  never ever coming again 😡😡😡😡

name: John Johnson
text: Great company!!!

name: Jonathan Brantley
text: Awesome place

name: Debbie Boles
text: great tasting coffee

name: Mark Pouncey
text: Great place to work!!!

name: Rebecca Victory
text: great coffee!!

name: Kevin Spurlin
text: I wish they sold it in stores!

name: Dmitry Kucher
text:
(Translated by Google) Very long unloading. You need to ring the doorbell and wait half an hour until someone comes and opens the door.

(Original)
Очень долгая разгрузка. Нужно позвонить в звонок на двери и ждать полчаса пока кто-то придет и окроет двери.

name: Geovanny Angeles
text:
(Translated by Google) It is a nice and beautiful place

(Original)
Es un lugar lindo y hermoso
